field.name: IsGs1Nomenclature
field.label: Is GS1 Nomenclature
field.help: This Nomenclature use the GS1 specification, only GS1-128 encoding rules is accepted is this kind of nomenclature.

field.name: Gs1SeparatorFnc1
field.label: FNC1 Separator
field.help: Alternative regex delimiter for the FNC1. The separator must not match the begin/end of any related rules pattern.
